backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister handling access control, user profiles, deposit intents, and submissions with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining public, auth, user, and admin routes with layouts and guards.
frontend/src/components/layouts/AdminDas: Admin dashboard layout with sidebar, header, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layouts/PublicLa: Public-facing layout with header, footer, and main routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layouts/UserDash: User dashboard layout with sidebar, header, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/nav/AdminSidebar: Admin sidebar navigation listing dashboard, deposits, users, announcements, and settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/DashboardHea: Header with sidebar trigger and logout button that clears identity, resets queries, and redirects to login.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicFooter: Public footer showing copyright, branding, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicHeader: Public navigation bar with logo, main links, and a mobile menu toggle.
Sidebar for authenticated users providing navigation to dashboard, token pages, and referral sections.
frontend/src/components/screens/AccessDe: Screen displayed when access is denied, offering navigation back to login or home.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profile, presale data, deposits, and admin/user-related actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Hook combining identity, actor, role, and user profile queries to expose session and authorization state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining VCoin brand colors and theme settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHome.tsx: Displays admin dashboard metrics using fetched user data and placeholders for token and deposit stats.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettings.t: Provides UI sections for presale, wallet, and vesting settings, currently with placeholder content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Announcements.t: Shows an announcements management page with a placeholder list of active announcements.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DepositsQueue.t: Renders the admin view for pending deposit approvals with a placeholder empty state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UsersManagement: Fetches and displays a table of all registered users with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/auth/Login.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and redirects users based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/auth/Register.tsx: Guides new users through II authentication and profile creation, then saves the profile and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/public/Home.tsx: Landing page showcasing VCoin features, hero section, and links to register or read the whitepaper.
frontend/src/pages/public/Roadmap.tsx: Displays the VCoin roadmap from 2025â€“2030 with yearly milestone lists.
frontend/src/pages/public/SmartContractA: Displays planned VCoin smart contract components and explains current off-chain presale management.
frontend/src/pages/public/Whitepaper.tsx: Renders VCoin whitepaper sections including project intro, tokenomics, referral model, and vesting logic.
frontend/src/pages/user/BuyVCoin.tsx: Provides UI to calculate VCN purchases, create deposit intents, and show current presale stage data.
frontend/src/pages/user/DepositHistory.t: Shows user deposit submissions with status indicators and parsed transaction details.
frontend/src/pages/user/ReferralEarnings: Displays user's referral code, allows copying links, and outlines the referral reward structure.
frontend/src/pages/user/ReferralNetworkT: Shows a referral network placeholder UI with messaging for users without referrals yet.
frontend/src/pages/user/TokenBalance.tsx: Displays locked, unlocked, and total VCN balances with notes on vesting and 2027 unlock.
frontend/src/pages/user/UserHome.tsx: Renders the user dashboard with links to buy tokens, view balance, referrals, and shows the user's referral code with copy functionality.
Displays vesting status and schedule, showing pre-launch info until the configured launch year and post-launch unlock details afterward.
frontend/src/routes/routeGuards.tsx: Provides user and admin route guards that redirect unauthenticated users, block non-admins, and enforce admin password-change requirements.
frontend/src/utils/fingerprint.ts: Generates and stores a simple browser fingerprint using user-agent, locale, screen info, and timezone.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to get, persist, and clear URL parameters, including hash-based routing support and sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and image needs for the VCoin web app.
